author: glenn
msg: Final cleanup of building docs so that links work both from local file system and from jakarta site

author: glenn
msg: Updated so that href URL's can be relative so that documentation
links work correctly both on the local file system and when uploaded
to jakarta.apache.org/taglibs.  Updated the title to include the
taglib name for all taglibs which have an intro.xml.

author: tdawson
msg: updated BundleTag to allow multiple uses per page, as long
as the bundle's locale's language matches (to avoid charset
also updated the examples to reflect these changes. documentation

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the <formatXXX> tags to use the response.getLocale() to allow the <i18n:bundle> to set the Locale used on a page. If the respone.getLocale() returns null then the request.getLocale() is used instead
